Package org.trafodion.sql.udr

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardinalityConstraintInfo
    A cardinality constraint
    ColumnInfo
    Describes a column in an input or output table or a parameter
    ComparisonPredicateInfo
    A comparison predicate to be evaluated on a table A predicate that compares a column value to a constant or another value that evaluates to a constant at runtime, like an SQL query parameter.
    ConstraintInfo
    A constraint on a table-valued input or output table
    LmCharsetCoder
    Java class to Character encoding and decoding between different character sets and Unicode
    LmClassLoader
    LmClassLoader is an extension of URLClassLoader which in turn is derived from SecureClassLoader.
    LmT2Driver
    Description: A driver class servicing the following URLs - "jdbc:sqlmx:" (JDBC/MX Type 2 connection) - "jdbc:default:connection" (Default connection) By default, Default Connections will be mapped to Type 4 connections.
    LmUDRObjMethodInvoke  
    LmUDRObjMethodInvoke.ReturnInfo  
    LmUtility  
    OrderInfo
    Ordering of a table by some ascending or descending columns
    ParameterListInfo
    Describes the parameters of a UDR.
    PartitionInfo
    Partitioning key of an input table or result table
    PredicateInfo
    A predicate to be evaluated on a table These could be different kinds of predicates, like an equals predicate, a non-equals predicate or more complex cases.
    ProvenanceInfo
    Describes where an output column is coming from.
    TableInfo
    Describes a table-valued input or a table-valued output
    TMUDRSerializableObject  
    TupleInfo
    Common base class for parameter lists and row layouts
    TypeInfo
    Data types in the UDR interface
    UDR
    This class represents the code associated with a UDR.
    UDR.QueueStateInfo  
    UDRInvocationInfo
    Describes an invocation of a UDR
    UDRPlanInfo
    Describes the query plan used for a UDR invocation
    UDRWriterCompileTimeData
    Compile time data owned by the UDR writer
    UniqueConstraintInfo
    A uniqueness constraint
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColumnInfo.ColumnUseCode
    Info on whether a table-valued input or output column is used
    ConstraintInfo.ConstraintTypeCode
    Type of a constraint
    OrderInfo.OrderTypeCode
    Ascending/descending order of columns
    PartitionInfo.PartitionTypeCode
    Type of partitioning
    PredicateInfo.EvaluationCode
    Info on whether a table-valued input or output column is used
    PredicateInfo.PredOperator
    Operator of a relational (comparison) predicate
    TypeInfo.SQLCharsetCode
    Character sets
    TypeInfo.SQLCollationCode
    Collations
    TypeInfo.SQLIntervalCode
    Start and end fields of interval columns
    TypeInfo.SQLTypeClassCode
    Classes of types defined in the SQL standard
    TypeInfo.SQLTypeCode
    SQL data types
    TypeInfo.SQLTypeSubClassCode
    More detailed type information, but not as detailed as the actual type
    UDRInvocationInfo.CallPhase
    Call phase for the UDR interface
    UDRInvocationInfo.DebugFlags
    Values used for the UDR_DEBUG_FLAGS CQD
    UDRInvocationInfo.FuncType
    Type of a TMUDF: Generic, Mapper or Reducer.
    UDRInvocationInfo.IsolationType
    Indicates the level of trust the system has in the UDR.
    UDRInvocationInfo.SQLAccessType
    Type of SQL operations done in the UDF
    UDRInvocationInfo.SQLRightsType
    Indicates what the effective user id for SQL operations performed by the UDR.
    UDRInvocationInfo.SQLTransactionType
    Indicates whether the UDF needs a transaction and possibly which type of transaction.
    UDRPlanInfo.SpecialDegreeOfParallelism
    Special degrees of parallelism.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UDRException
    This is the exception to throw when an error occurs in a UDR.
